column5: Get that peaceful, easy feeling at Cox Cove at Canyon Lake! My multi-story all cedar 3 bedroom, 2 bath home has 4 swings from which to enjoy the serene surroundings. There are queen beds in the master bedroom and guest room, and a full and twin bunk bed set up in a second guest bedroom. All mattresses are memory foam to ensure a relaxing sleep after a day of fun on the lake! Master suite has a separate balcony, and large en suite bathroom.
column8: Cozy Cottage with Stunning Lake Views - Cox Cove
